attributes.comment:
I am writing to let you know of my concern regarding the proposed fee increases
for filing fees. I am especially interested in those in the area of
international adoption. My husband and I are in the midst of the adoption
process, and are finding that is very costly. In fact, many families choose not
to adopt strictly because of the prohibitive costs. There are many orphans
around the world that need loving families. Please do your part in choosing to
NOT increase these filing fees, and keep the costs for international adoption as
low as possible. Thank you.
attributes.title: Comment Submitted by Melissa Nugent
